DOC.brief_summary: To find test elaborate parameter specific immunotherapy allergic patient
DOC.brief_title: Pilot Trial Elaborate Cutaneous Antigen Neutralization Test Patients Suffering From Rhinoconjunctivitis
DOC.criteria: Age 18 65 Signed inform consent SIT 2000/2001 10 patient SIT good result 10 patient bad result Exclusion criterion : Pregnancy breastfeed
